boardgame.description: Werewolf takes place in a small village which is haunted by werewolves._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each player is secretly assigned a role - Werewolf, Villager, or Seer (a special Villager). There is also a Moderator who controls the flow of the game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game alternates between night and day phases. At night, the Werewolves secretly choose a Villager to kill. Also, the Seer (if still alive) asks whether another player is a Werewolf or not. During the day, the Villager who was killed is revealed and is out of the game. The remaining Villagers then vote on the player they suspect is a Werewolf. That player reveals his/her role and is out of the game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Werewolves win when there are an equal number of Villagers and Werewolves. Villagers win when they have killed all Werewolves. Werewolf is a social game that requires no equipment to play, and can accommodate almost any large group of players._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Looney Labs (LOO019) A mind game for 8-15 players, in which a vengeful group of villagers must figure out who among them is secretly a werewolf (before it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s too late...) Each _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;night_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; the werewolves eat a villager, and each _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;day_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; the surviving villagers attempt to rid the town of werewolves by lynching one of their own. The set includes 2 Werewolf cards, 1 Seer, 1 Moderator, and 12 Villager cards, plus instructions. (Based on an enduring classic, more commonlyknown as Mafia.)

SELLERS TERMS AND CONDITIONS: PAYMENT TERMS: Payment is due within 2 days of the date you placed the order. Please do not purchase if you do not intend to follow through with the transaction. PAYMENT METHODS: PayPal SHIPPING: Buyer is responsible for all shipping cost. All orders are shipping Priority Mail. RETURNS: All returns require authorization BEFORE returning the item. We will accept returns within 5 days of your receipt of the order. We only accept returns on items which are in their original condition. Original condition means, the game have not been played and all parts are in the same condition as they were when you received the game. We only refund shipping costs if the return is a result of our error. If you refuse delivery of an order, we will deduct the return shipping charge from your refund.

New in shrink wrap. Canadians will be charge applicable taxes. Orders will be processed the same day and shipped by expedited parcel. You will be charged exact shipping plus $2 for packing material.
